title: The Box
description: Seven people, seventeen weeks, only one will beat The Box. Contestants answer questions to gain advantages or to give disadvantages to their competitors.
altHero: a row of large glass boxes, illuminated in different colors, each with a person inside
alt1: Matt LeBlanc smiles outside one of the boxes, a half-naked man stands inside
alt2: a contestant covers his face in frustration as a man in lederhosen plays a tuba behind him
alt3: LeBlanc points at a big display labeled “Disadvantages” and the option “Gilbert Gottfried” is illuminated
alt4: a man is dressed as a giant baby with diaper and bonnet
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
